Sentencas: Scanchum-doped lanthanum strontium manganate La0.8Sr0.2Mn1-xScxO3-delta (LSMS) combined with YSZ as composite cathode for ancide-supported solid oxide fuel cell is investigated.
Titulo: Investigation on scandium-doped manganate La0.8Sr0.2Mn1-xScxO3-δ cathode for intermediate temperaturesolid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The LSMS powders are prepared using the modified Pechini method.
Titulo: Investigation on scandium-doped manganate La0.8Sr0.2Mn1-xScxO3-δ cathode for intermediate temperaturesolid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The XRD and H-2-TPR results reveal that non-stoichiometric defects are introduced into the perovskite lattice of LSMS samples as a result of Sc substitution, which leads to increased oxygen ion mobility in the Sc containing samples.
Titulo: Investigation on scandium-doped manganate La0.8Sr0.2Mn1-xScxO3-δ cathode for intermediate temperaturesolid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: But high level doping of Sc may results in the segregation of the Sc2O3 secondary phase at elevated temperature.
Titulo: Investigation on scandium-doped manganate La0.8Sr0.2Mn1-xScxO3-δ cathode for intermediate temperaturesolid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The cells with the LSMS-containing cathodes exhibit higher performances, especially at lower temperatures, which can be ascribed to the increased oxygen anionic vacancies in the LSMS.
Titulo: Investigation on scandium-doped manganate La0.8Sr0.2Mn1-xScxO3-δ cathode for intermediate temperaturesolid oxide fuel cells
Investigation on scandium-doped manganate La0.8Sr0.2Mn1-xScxO3-δ cathode for intermediate temperaturesolid oxide fuel cells
